seamoss repeat round 20 of teapot sugar bowl lid with zarya fog rnds 1-4 repeat rnds 1-4 of saucer finish off lid knob with seamoss make knob same as for teapot lid knob creamer with zarya fog rnds 1-10 repeat rnds 1-10 of cup 32 single_crochet round 11 chain 1 14 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st 3 single_crochet in next two sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in the remaining sts around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st st 38 single_crochet round 12 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st st finish off handle with zarya fog make handle same as cup handle spoon with seamoss make two round 1 chain 2 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch to first single_crochet 8 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next two single_crochet single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the last single_crochet join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 12 single_crochet chain 12 single_crochet in the back loop of the 2nd chain from hook and in ea chain across join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet of round 2 11 single_crochet finish off terminology single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch round s round s chain chain
